org.apache.james.user.api.model

Interface JamesUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    User
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJamesUser
    Deprecated. 
    Just use the User interface for Users. Forwarding and Aliasing should get done via RecipientRewriteTable

    @Deprecated
public interface JamesUser
extends User
    Interface for objects representing users of an email/ messaging system.
